resources.string: Do not show this dialog anymore
This service will run all the time to keep app alive and allow you to receive calls and messages without push notifications.
A secured, open source and French communication app.
Your communications are safe thanks to our end-to-end encryption.
A free and open source application since 2001.
File has been exported to native gallery
Error trying to export file to native gallery
File has been exported to documents
Error trying to export file to documents
Media volume is low, you may not hear anything!
Error while trying to download and apply remote configuration
Error trying to create media player
By continuing, you accept our %1$s and %2$s.
Are you sure your phone number is %s?
Use a third party SIP account
SIP address doesn\'t contains a username!
We have sent a verification code on your phone number %1$s.\n\nPlease enter the verification code below:
Create an account with your email on:

Some features require a &appName; account, such as group messaging, video conferences‚Ä¶

These features are hidden when you register with a third party SIP account.

To enable it in a commercial project, please contact us.
I prefer to create an account
Push notifications not available, account creation disabled
Push notification with auth token not received in 5 seconds, please try again later
Unexpected error occurred, please try again later
Failed to login: error code is %s
To fully enjoy &appName; we need you to grant us the following permissions :
Read contacts: To display your contacts and find whom is using &appName;.
Post notifications: To be informed when you receive a message or a call.
Record audio: So your correspondent can hear you and to record voice messages.
Access camera: To capture video during video calls and conferences.
An error occurred while checking for update
A new version %s is available. Do you want to update?
Clear imported contacts from native address book
Warning: once enabled it can\'t be disabled!
Do you really want to encrypt everything?
Be careful, it can\'t be undone!
Prevents echo from being heard by remote end if no hardware echo canceller is available
Vibrate while incoming call is ringing
Mark conversation as read when dismissing message notification
Store newly created contacts in it
Please fill at least the display name and the server URL
Min characters to start a query
A error occurred, LDAP server not saved!
Create end-to-end encrypted meetings & group calls
This account in online, everybody can call you.
Account has been disabled, you won\'t receive any call or message.
Account is connecting to the server, please wait‚Ä¶
Account connection failed, check your settings.
Pick your country to allow &appName; to match your contacts.
This mode guarantee your data confidentiality. Our end-to-end encryption technology provide the highest level or security for your communications.
This mode allows you to enjoy all &appName; features while staying interoperable with any SIP service through point-to-point encryption.
If you wish to delete your account permanently, go to: https://sip.linphone.org
Replace + by 00 when formatting phone numbers

Connection failed because authentication is missing or invalid for account 
%s.

You can provide password again, or check your account configuration in the settings.
No suggestion and no contact for the moment‚Ä¶
Do you really want to delete all calls history?
All calls will be removed from the history
Do you really want to delete the history with that person?
All calls will be removed from the history
Please fill either first name, last name or company name
Hello, join me on &appName;! You can download it for free at %s
You\'re about to make a call to %1$s\'s device %2$s.\nDo you want to make the call?
Check all of your contact devices to make sure your communications will be secured an unaltered.\nWhen all will be verified, you\'ll reach maximum trust level.
This contact will be definitively removed.
Choose a number or a SIP address
Text is waiting to be shared
New messages will be automatically deleted once read by everyone.\nChoose a duration:
Please enter a name for the conversation
No contact and no suggestion for the moment‚Ä¶
Messages in this conversation are e2e encrypted. Only your correspondent can decrypt them.
Thanks to end-to-end encryption technology in &appName;, messages, calls and meetings confidentiality are guaranteed. No-one can decrypt exchanged data, not even ourselves.
For your safety, this conversation was disabled.
You enabled mandatory encryption. Non encrypted conversations are disabled for your safety. You can re-create this conversation or disable mandatory encryption in your account parameters.
&appName; can\'t open this file.\n\nDo you want to open it in another app (if possible), or export it on your device?
No app found to open this kind of file.\n\nWould you like to try opening it as plain text?
Can\'t create conversation with a participant not on the same domain due to security restrictions!
Failed to add participant(s) to conversation
No app found to open this kind of file
Do you really want to delete all messages?
All messages will be removed from the history
No address to add to contact
All participants will receive a call.
Do you want to cancel the meeting and send a notification to all participants?
Do you want to delete the meeting?
Please fill the title and select at least one participant
Failed to send all invites to meeting!
Failed to send invites to some participants of the meeting!
You\'ll be joining in a short moment
You\'re about to transfer call %1$s to %2$s.
For your safety, we need to authenticate your correspondent device.\nPlease exchange your codes:
For your safety, we need to re-authenticate your correspondent device.\nPlease re-exchange your codes:
This call confidentiality may be compromise!
Failed to create a group call!
Are you sure you want to remove this participant from the conference?
Participant was kicked out of conference
Invalid SIP address, can\'t be added to conference
Too many participants for mosaic layout
Removes the last digit or character
Click to show all available options
This message is a reply to a previous message

Click to edit the subject of this conversation
